issue.title: [Rust] Add a param "dialect" for DFParser::parse_sql
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9673](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9673). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
i use func 'DFParser::parse_sql' in outsie app with mysql dialect, but parser_sql use generic dialect default, we need to add a parameter so that we can pass in the dialect.

thanks.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9673?focusedCommentId=17178567) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7916
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7916>
